thread.title: Alabama recruiting podcast: Crimson Tide battling Georgia for momentum
thread.title_full: Alabama recruiting podcast: Crimson Tide battling Georgia for momentum | AL.com

author: Drew Champlin | dchamplin@al.com
title: Alabama recruiting podcast: Crimson Tide battling Georgia for momentum
text:
In the first edition of Champ's Corner, AL.com's Drew Champlin and co-host Mark Jennings hit up a number of topics.
The hosts recap the commitments of Xavier McKinney (football) and Ar'Mond Davis (basketball), highlight a key visitor from Alabama's game against ULM and look at some recruiting battles between Alabama and Georgia . Also, can Alabama get back higher in the mix with five-star linebacker Lyndell Wilson ?
The hosts dive into some DraftKings picks for the game and the last five minutes of Champ's Corner features the MLS Moment, highlighting what's going on in Major League Soccer, specifically with the Portland Timbers and Sporting KC.
Listen to their takes in the audio player below and leave a comment or question for next week's Champ's Corner: Alabama recruiting edition below.
This podcast is powered by BamaSportsRadio.com as part of the VSporto network .
